description.label: Special Interest Areas cover six categories that you may choose to explore. What are your interests? Set your own goals and then Plan>Do>Review> to complete a project!

empty_state.label: Letâ€™s create a Special Interest Area project!

info_box.label:
Complete 6 projects, each totalling at least 8 hours across at least 3 areas to achieve this requirement for your Australian Scout Award. 
 
####The Special Interest Areas are: 
 * Adventure & Sport 
 * Arts & Literature 
 * Creating a Better World 
 * Environment 
 * Growth & Development 
 * STEM & Innovation
